paragraphs.name: cf34

virtuals.subtitle: I think you were passively aggressively punishing those people around you, who were dependent on you, you blew it all up.

93fbcb9f9ed5.title: I was wondering how to spell narcissism but then I realized, you know what, you just gotta do what…

paragraphs.text: I was wondering how to spell narcissism but then I realized, you know what, you just gotta do what you think is going to make you happy. It’s not like you ran and jumped off a cliff knowing full well how the fall was going to end, well, maybe you did a little, well, a lot actually.

content.subtitle: I think you were passively aggressively punishing those people around you, who were dependent on you, you blew it all up.

content.subtitle: I have a webdesign business myself but I mainly love to design things, money comes next. A friend of mine is always talking about the money…

paragraphs.text: This is a timely read. I am having thoughts on leaving a nice job to get a Master’s degree because I think that’s what I need to move to the field I like and that it would also somehow serve as an external validation. Some ideas about money also resonated with me.
paragraphs.name: b710

paragraphs.text: Brilliant article! A lot of thoughts you have expressed, are exactly what i have went through, and have made similar conclusions. The external validation is a very important thing to me as well — either to gain acceptance, or to get the needed confidence. But time and again, i realized that people who we once considered masters, who can validate us…
paragraphs.name: 8e79

f4b036527836.name: Hoss Hoss

paragraphs.text: I suspect that part of me places formal qualifications in the way of my success. I feel that I have to get some external validation that I am qualified or capable to do something. In fact, I can coach people effectively without a PhD in psychology. I can do all the things I originally set out to do without qualifications. I can deliver talks, write books, and lead workshops right now, and I could before I even started on my PhD program.
paragraphs.name: 628d
